response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will meet your expectations and exceed them. Considering its worth to you, I propose a special introductory price of $14,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my commitment to ensuring you have access to this remarkable product at an attractive rate. Please let me know if this proposal meets your requirements, and we can proceed with the transaction promptly.", "product_price": 14000}
